channel.title: Your favourite year on RS? Poll (Exluding Graphics)
channel.description:
So as you people may or may not know I'm currently working on an RSPS and I'm stuck on what year to base the server on. Forget the graphics as that can be changed but what year in terms of content; which year was your personal favourite?
I've also put together a list for you guys which has what was released in what year to help you make an informed vote if you need it or are just interested. It doesn't include absolutely everything but it should help as a rough guide. :)
If you have a spare minute then please leave a comment below too with any further information on this topic that could help me! Thank you.
RS2 Released (March 29, 2004)
[b]2004[/b]
Unholy, Holy & Balance Books -----------(17 November 2004)
[b]2005[/b]
Crystal Bow ------------------------------(7 February, 2005) Ghostly Robes ---------------------------(18 April, 2005) Barrows ----------------------------------(9 May, 2005) Obsidian Cape/Maul/M/S/D -------------(19 September - 4 October, 2005) Fire Cape --------------------------------(4 October, 2005) Dragon Axe ------------------------------(7 November, 2005)
Ancient Magicks ---------------------------(18 April, 2005)
[b]2006[/b]
Gloves up to Barrows --------------------(15 March, 2006) Void Equipment -------------------------(18 April, 2006) Defenders up to Rune ONLY -------------(12 June, 2006) Skill Capes ------------------------------(18 October 2006)
Lunar Spells ----------------------------(24 July, 2006)
Construction Skill -----------------------(May 31, 2006) Hunter Skill -----------------------------(21 November, 2006)
[b]2007[/b]
Dark Bow --------------------------------(11 June, 2007) Dragonfire Shield -------------------------(18 June, 2007) Boots Up to Bandos ----------------------(28 August, 2007) Godswords --------------------------------(28 August, 2007) Bandos, Armadyl etc. --------------------(28 August, 2007)
[b]2008[/b]
Inferno Adze -----------------------------(26 August, 2008) Dragon Claws ----------------------------(26 November, 2008) Spirit Shields -----------------------------(15 September, 2008) Vesta's, Statius, Zuriels & Morrigans ---(15 October, 2008) Sacred/Volatile Clay Pickaxe/Hatchet---(11 November, 2008)
Summoning Skill ------------------------(15 January, 2008)
[b]2009[/b]
Dragon Pickaxe --------------------------(9 September, 2009)
[b]2010+[/b]
Chaotics ----------------------------------(12 April, 2010) Torva, Virtus & Pernix -------------------(10 January, 2011) Drygores ---------------------------------(14 January, 2013)
Dungeoneering Skill ---------------------(12 April, 2010) Divination Skill ---------------------------(20 August, 2013)

item.title: Your favourite year on RS? Poll (Exluding Graphics)
item.dc:creator: @runerunerune runerunerune
item.description:
@runerunerune wrote:

2005 was the best when barrows was the best armour and I remember being so excited about the farming update , I have never been so wrong in all my life

Read full topic
item.source: Your favourite year on RS? Poll (Exluding Graphics)

item.title: Your favourite year on RS? Poll (Exluding Graphics)
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

Late 2005-Early 2007 for me. Post-Fire cape, pre-godswords (though I don’t hate that revision either)

Read full topic
item.source: Your favourite year on RS? Poll (Exluding Graphics)

item.description:
@jediz wrote:

2005-2007 for me. Although I don’t mind present day RuneScape.
